title: ResourceSlice
description: ResourceSlice is the Schema for the resourceslices API

apiVersion.description:

Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: ResourceSliceSpec defines the desired state of ResourceSlice.

class.description: Class contains the class of the ResourceSlice.

consumerClusterID.description: ConsumerClusterID is the id of the consumer cluster.

csr.description: CSR is the Certificate Signing Request of the consumer cluster.

providerClusterID.description: ProviderClusterID is the id of the provider cluster.

resources.description: Resources contains the slice of resources requested.

status.description: ResourceSliceStatus defines the observed state of ResourceSlice.

authParams.description: AuthParams contains the authentication parameters for the resources given by the provider cluster.

awsConfig.description: AwsConfig contains the AWS configuration and access key for the Liqo user and the current EKS cluster.

conditions.description: Conditions contains the conditions of the ResourceSlice.

items.description: ResourceSliceCondition contains details about the status of the provided ResourceSlice.

lastTransitionTime.description: LastTransitionTime -> timestamp for when the condition last transitioned from one status to another.

message.description: Message -> Human-readable message indicating details about the last status transition.

reason.description: Reason -> Machine-readable, UpperCamelCase text indicating the reason for the condition's last transition.

ingressClasses.description: IngressClasses contains the list of the ingress classes offered by the cluster.

items.description: IngressType defines the type of ingress offered by a resource offer.

default.description: Default indicates whether this ingress class is the default ingress class for Liqo.

ingressClassName.description: IngressClassName indicates the name of the ingress class.

loadBalancerClasses.description: LoadBalancerClasses contains the list of the load balancer classes offered by the cluster.

items.description: LoadBalancerType defines the type of load balancer offered by a resource offer.

default.description: Default indicates whether this load balancer class is the default load balancer class for Liqo.

loadBalancerClassName.description: LoadBalancerClassName indicates the name of the load balancer class.

nodeLabels.description: NodeLabels contains the provider cluster labels.

nodeSelector.description: NodeSelector contains the selector to be applied to offloaded pods.

resources.description: Resources contains the slice of resources accepted.

storageClasses.description: StorageClasses contains the list of the storage classes offered by the cluster.

items.description: StorageType defines the type of storage offered by a resource offer.

default.description: Default indicates whether this storage class is the default storage class for Liqo.

storageClassName.description: StorageClassName indicates the name of the storage class.
